Text.Page:
Ecryl wants to bring in reinforcements by beach, but the {@LinkCreature:10#2#grove} and {@LinkCreature:10#3#virek kamaras} make landing a force dangerous. Fortunately, we have a solution.

Kill the kamaras. Simple.

Excellent work, .

I'm sorry to report Ecryl's request was turned down, but don't feel badly. The kamaras are delicious when roasted.
